name: Stremio
short_description: Media center for streaming with addons - movies, shows, and video content.
description: Stremio is a media center application that lets you discover and watch videos. It supports movies, TV shows, and video content through community-built addons. The server version allows you to host your own streaming backend. Features include addons for various content sources, library for tracking watched content, calendar for upcoming releases, and cross-platform streaming. Note: Use with caution and respect copyright laws.
usecases: Discover new movies and shows through addons.
